type: Health Care Unit Disinfection and Cleaning Contract
department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: This is to let  through notice, the ______________ to act by June 20th, 2019.
description: The Purchaser is getting ______________ from the Supplier, the disinfection and cleaning of a health care unit.
full_summary:
#### Government Tender Announcement
#### English Summary

We are issuing a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the disinfection and cleaning of a health care unit located in Bagotville, Quebec. The successful supplier will be responsible for providing labor and equipment necessary for the service, as outlined in the solicitation documents.

The RFP documents are available on the [Ariba Discovery](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16292875?extsite=MTYyOTI4NzVfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==) platform. Interested suppliers must submit their bid electronically by 2 PM EDT on July 18th, 2023. Late bids will be deemed non-responsive.

#### French Summary

 Nous publions une Demande de Proposition (DDP) pour la désinfection, le nettoyage et l’entretien d’un centre en soin de la santé, situé à Bagotville, Québec. Le fournisseur retenu devra fournir la main-d’œuvre et l’équipement nécessaires pour le service, comme le précise les documents de l’ invitation à soumissionner.

 Les documents de la DDP sont disponibles sur la plateforme [Ariba Discovery](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16292875?extsite=MTYyOTI4NzVfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==). Les fournisseurs intéressés doivent soumettre leur offre électroniquement avant 14:00 HAE, le 18 juillet 2023. Les offres déposées après 14:00 HAE seront déclarées non conformes.

#### Official Tender Details

- **Reference Number:** WS3895214018-Doc3919539000
- **Publication Date:** May 16, 2023
- **Tender Closing Date:** July 18th, 2023, 2 PM EDT
- **Regions of Delivery:** Saguenay
- **Procurement Category:** SRV
- **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding
- **Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price
- **Trade Agreements:** Various (please refer to the solicitation documents for details)

#### Contact Information

For more information, please contact:

Marie-Claude Dugal (elle/la / she/her)
Email: [marie-claude.dugal@tpsgc-pwg
